testimonials.text: I strongly recommend Pushpak as a highly dedicated and proficient software engineer. Throughout our year of collaboration, he consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic, reliability, and ability to deliver results. Pushpak approaches tasks with precision and enthusiasm, excelling in problem-solving and fostering seamless teamwork with other teams at PayPal. He met deadlines and significantly contributed to critical projects, showcasing his technical skills and a positive attitude. Pushpak is a reliable, results-oriented professional who brings both expertise and a collaborative spirit to any team. wholeheartedly endorse him for his exceptional work and impactful contributions.

Pushpak has been an great asset to our team, quickly ramping up on PayPal specific tooling, learning our tech stack, and being a productive and collaborative member of our team from the get-go. As a platform team, we interface a lot with other stakeholders to ensure we're supporting their needs. Pushpak is always in our support channels answering questions, creating tickets to track feature requests and bugs, and proactively improving our tooling to fill in gaps that he came across on his own. The team and I also really appreciate his warm, can-do attitude and pragmatic approach to solving problems. He's also always cordial and active in the code review process, open to feedback, and tactful in giving feedback, too. I can't recommend Pushpak enough! ðŸŽ‰
